name: This Game Has Two Choices
description:
Content warning: violence, suicide

This Game Has Two Choices is my first stab at writing a story using Ink. When running Inky, Ink's primary developing tool, the sample text looks like this:

Once upon a time...

* There were two choices.

 * There were four lines of content.

- They lived happily ever after.

Using this prompt, I wanted to write a story that only had two choices but with a theme that justified that limitation.
